item.description:
Check out this link I (Dave) believe the park is now open on weekends in May so the dogs would have to be on leash.  

http://www.kittery.org/Pages/KitteryME_Clerk/FortFosterPolicies

 

 

A. SCHEDULED HOURS OF OPERATION 1. Gate attendants will open the park on weekends in May before Memorial Day and September after Labor Day from 10:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. or sunset, whichever is earlier. (9/3/97)

 

 

B. GENERAL REGULATIONS 9. Dogs must be kept on a leash at all times. Owners will be asked to leave the park if their dog is not under control. (9/3/97) 10. A "pooper scooper" rule is in effect for dogs. Owners must take their dog waste with them when they leave the park. (6/9/97), (9/3/97)
11. Dogs are prohibited from Pier Beach east of the Pier for approximately 400 feet, or as designated by signs. (8/23/04)

 

D. DAY-USE VISITOR PASS FEES 1. Motor Vehicle Day Pass - $10.00 (includes pass for vehicle and occupants.  (12/20/99) So this means carpooling to get in would be best.
item.why: the last time we went the dogs all had a blast. we would love to do this again before it closes to off lead dog walks during season.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: kittery point, maine
